channel.title: Many questions *-About the official Moparscape Client-*
channel.description:
I'm [i]extremely[/i] confused. Here's a list of questions I have:
Is Moparscape auto-updating? If so, why isn't mine updated?
Is Moparscape Revolution out yet (moparisthebest.com says something about MSR)
Is Moparscape 317, 377, 474, 503, 508, 525, or something else?
I'm a total n00p when it comes to p-servr development.

item.title: Many questions *-About the official Moparscape Client-*
item.dc:creator: @God_of_Rock God of Rock
item.description:
@God_of_Rock wrote:

I think I’ve found out how. I searched around on Google and found a site that has some translations.

EDIT

I translated the batch of one client into a shell. I got a message saying I don’t have the permissions to open it. I’m not an admin on my computer (my dad wants to set time limits :P). Is it possible to change the permissions?

Read full topic
item.source: Many questions *-About the official Moparscape Client-*

item.title: Many questions *-About the official Moparscape Client-*
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

You could always search around google, or ask someone else. Also, its almost the same as batch just a little different so if u copy and paste a batch file and edit it i bet u could get a .sh out of it.

Read full topic

item.description:

I run Mac OS X, so I need to learn how to make an executable JAR file, or convert the run.bat file into a shell script. Does anyone care enough to teach me how to do this?

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: Many questions *-About the official Moparscape Client-*
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

Moparscape hasn’t been updated in atleast a year.

Moparscape Revolution? Is that a Client or Server? (If its a server no) (If its a client i haven’t heard about it)

The Moparscape Client has 317 cache.

Good luck,

Andrew

Read full topic
